Producer: Monika Bacardi, James Franco, Andrea Iervolino, Vince Jolivette
Production Co: Rabbit Bandini Productions, Aperture Media Partners
Synopsis: In California apple country, 900 migratory workers rise up against the landowners. The group takes on a life of its own, stronger than its individual members and more frightening. Led by the doomed Jim Nolan (Nat Wolff), the strike is founded on his tragic idealism and the philosophy to never submit or yield.
Title: In Dubious Battle
